mapper.select: select to_char(r.reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reservation_st, r.reservation_num, u.user_name, u.user_tel, p.pet_name from tb_reservation r, tb_user u, tb_petservice p where r.reservation_num = p.reservation_num and u.user_id = r.user_id and u.user_id = #{user_id} order by r.reservation_st desc

select count(*) from tb_reservation
where ${colName} like '%'|| #{searchWord} ||'%'
where to_char(reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
where to_char(reservation_st, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{startDate} and #{endDate} where ${colName} like '%'|| #{searchWord} ||'%'
order by reservation_st desc
